Package controlPanel

Class UserControl

java.lang.Object
controlPanel.UserControl
public class UserControl
extends java.lang.Object
The UserControl contains on the communication methods between the Control Panel to the server for User Methods. It includes methods which will use functions from helpers that initialises communication and returns relevant object from server or server acknowledgements, such as creating, editing, removing users.

  • Method Details

    • logoutRequest

      public static Server.ServerAcknowledge logoutRequest​(java.lang.String sessionToken) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      Send a user's request to log out to the server and expire the session token.
      Parameters:
      sessionToken - A String which is the session token that is created when the user initially logs in.
      Returns:
      Returns a ServerAcknowledge which is a message as to whether logout was successful or an error occurred.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Throws an exception if an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Throws an exception when a specified class cannot be found in the classpath.

    • hash

      public static java.lang.String hash​(java.lang.String password) throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Hashes the password that the user types in on the control panel on login to be sent to the server for validation.
      Parameters:
      password - A String which is the password to be hashed.
      Returns:
      Returns a String which is the representation of the hashed password.
      Throws:
      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - Throws an exception when the hashing algorithm requested does not exist.

    • loginRequest

      public static java.lang.Object loginRequest​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String passwordFromControlPanel) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException, java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Sends a user's request to log in to the server. Hashes the password on the client-side before sending across for validation. Receives a string acknowledgement from the server and the session token is created if successful.
      Parameters:
      username - A String which is the username of the user that is entered upon starting the GUI.
      passwordFromControlPanel - A String which is the password of the user that is entered upon starting the GUI.
      Returns:
      Returns an Object which is the session token if match found in database, otherwise string acknowledgement for an error occurred.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Throws an exception if an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Throws an exception when a specified class cannot be found in the classpath.
      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - Throws an exception when the hashing algorithm requested does not exist.

    • createUserRequest

      public static Server.ServerAcknowledge createUserRequest​(java.lang.String sessionToken, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String passwordFromControlPanel, boolean createBillboard, boolean editBillboard, boolean scheduleBillboard, boolean editUser) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException, java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Sends a user's request to create a user to the server. Receives a string acknowledgement from the server if user creation is successful.
      Parameters:
      sessionToken - A String which is the session token for the current log in (contains calling user).
      username - A String which is the username of the user that is to be created.
      passwordFromControlPanel - A String password of the user that is entered upon starting the GUI.
      createBillboard - A Boolean which is true if the user has the Create Billboards Permission.
      editBillboard - A Boolean which is true if the user has the Edit Billboards Permission.
      scheduleBillboard - A Boolean which is true if the user has the Schedule Billboards Permission.
      editUser - A Boolean which is true if the user has the Edit Users Permission.
      Returns:
      Returns a String server acknowledgement if user creation is successful, otherwise error message occurred.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Throws an exception if an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Throws an exception when a specified class cannot be found in the classpath.
      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - Throws an exception when the hashing algorithm requested does not exist.

    • deleteUserRequest

      public static Server.ServerAcknowledge deleteUserRequest​(java.lang.String sessionToken, java.lang.String username) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      Sends a user's request to delete a user to the server. Receives a string acknowledgement from the server if user deletion is successful.
      Parameters:
      sessionToken - A String which is the session token for the current log in (contains calling user).
      username - A String which is the username of the user that is to be deleted.
      Returns:
      Returns a ServerAcknowledge which is a message if user deletion is successful, otherwise error message occurred.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Throws an exception if an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Throws an exception when a specified class cannot be found in the classpath.

    • listUsersRequest

      public static java.lang.Object listUsersRequest​(java.lang.String sessionToken) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      Sends a user's request to lists users to the server. Receives a string acknowledgement from the server if user deletion is successful.
      Parameters:
      sessionToken - A String which a session token for the current log in (contains calling user).
      Returns:
      Returns an Object which is an ArrayList of all usernames, or ServerAcknowledge for error message occurred.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Throws an exception if an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Throws an exception when a specified class cannot be found in the classpath.

    • getPermissionsRequest

      public static java.lang.Object getPermissionsRequest​(java.lang.String sessionToken, java.lang.String username) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      Sends a user's request to get a user's permissions to the server. Receives a server acknowledgement from the server if user permission retrieval failed, otherwise a boolean arrayList for whether the user has the corresponding permission (order is createBillboard, editBillboard, editSchedule, editUser).
      Parameters:
      sessionToken - A String which is a session token for the current log in (contains calling user).
      username - A String which is the username of the user's permissions to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      Returns an Object which is an ArrayList(Boolean) for the user's permissions, or ServerAcknowledge for error message occurred.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Throws an exception if an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Throws an exception when a specified class cannot be found in the classpath.

    • setPasswordRequest

      public static Server.ServerAcknowledge setPasswordRequest​(java.lang.String sessionToken, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException, java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Sends a user's request to set a password in the database to the server. Hashes the password before sending across to the server. Receives a server acknowledgement from the server - Success or Failure acknowledgment.
      Parameters:
      sessionToken - A String which is the session token for the current log in (contains calling user).
      username - A String which is the username of the user's password to be set.
      password - A String which is the new password to be set.
      Returns:
      A ServerAcknowledge for success or error message.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Throws an exception if an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Throws an exception when a specified class cannot be found in the classpath.
      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - Throws an exception when the hashing algorithm requested does not exist.

    • setPermissionsRequest

      public static Server.ServerAcknowledge setPermissionsRequest​(java.lang.String sessionToken, java.lang.String username, java.lang.Boolean createBillboard, java.lang.Boolean editBillboard, java.lang.Boolean scheduleBillboard, java.lang.Boolean editUser) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      Sends a user's request to set a user's permissions in the database to the server. Receives a server acknowledgement from the server - Success or Failure acknowledgment.
      Parameters:
      sessionToken - A String which is a session token for the current log in (contains calling user).
      username - A String which is the username of the user's permissions to be set.
      createBillboard - A Boolean value to indicate whether the user has the createBillboards permission.
      editBillboard - A Boolean value to indicate whether the user has the editBillboards permission.
      scheduleBillboard - A Boolean value to indicate whether the user has the scheduleBillboards permission.
      editUser - A Boolean value to indicate whether the user has the editUsers permission.
      Returns:
      A ServerAcknowledge for success or error message.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Throws an exception if an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Throws an exception when a specified class cannot be found in the classpath.
